extendedInfo.description: Race against the clock to complete tricky air courses in this 3D, accurately modelled, air race flight sim.Fly around a desert scene passing through hoops, past pylons and performing aerobatic maneuvers.*By popular demand, now with Rudder!*Now with 17 pylon levels - is far easier than the pure hoop levels and more competitive as you take risks flying low to shave time off your score!*New Challenge levels test to see how far you can go without making an error!*Openfeint integrated - all levels above the training stage have leaderboards, plus achievements.*41 levels-7 Training-17 Pylon levels-6 Hoop courses-6 Maneuvers-5 ChallengesMore levels and features coming soon...Note, if you have already upgraded the demo to full version with in-app purchase, do not purchase this because it is the same content.**Quick note on controls**Race Pilot 3D has been designed to play like a flight sim and your device is like the control stick on a plane. Tilt left and the plane rolls left, it will carry on rolling left until you return the device to the level, where it will hold the angle. Tilt back to pitch up, it will keep pitching up until you return the device to centre where it will keep that angle of climb. Need any help, please email/tweet or visit http://eawapps.blogspot.com/2011/09/race-pilot-3d-controls-help.htmlIf you have any feedback on the game or experience any problems, I'd love to hear from you. Email or twitter is preferred eawapps@gmail.com @eawappsPermissionsWeb permissions are for openfeint.SD permissions are for openfeint.EULA and privacy statement available here: http://eawapps.blogspot.com/2011/09/race-pilot-3d-end-user-license.htmlIn development:*More levels*Cockpit Camera View

reviews.title: Great game
reviews.comment: Lots of fun, and enjoyably challenging
reviews.author: Quentin Christensen

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: I this is an excellent GAME. If you want flights of fancy, to be an ace or win wars single handedly then this GAME is not for you.
reviews.author: Graham Robb

reviews.title: Robbed
reviews.comment: Bought this last night today it claims its not licensed, won\'t let me on levels I have already completed because \"i have not got a license\" WANT MY MONEY BACK OR TO PLAY THE GAME I PAID FOR
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fun game
reviews.comment: Fun game .... but would be less aggravating if there was a reset button to restart the level your trying to learn, there is no way to bail out except crash
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not terrible...
reviews.comment: just not really worth it. I feel like falling asleep with no sound effects and boring game types.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Simple but addictive. More levels please!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not realistic
reviews.comment: The game is OK. It\'s more of an arcade game than a flying game. Rudder is very unrealistic...out shifts the plane left and right rather than yawing it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Still will not open.
reviews.comment: After the update it still does not open when selecting a menu item on my droid x.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Good game i just suck at it
